title: Blood stock
creator_credit: Darrel Catling and J. Arthur Rank Organisation
brief_description: Beginning with all the gaiety of Epsom Downs on a traditional Derby Day, the film traces the career of a prospective Derby candidate, showing the generations of scientific breeding and the years of careful grooming and training which produce winners of this classic race. Shows famous studs, the yearling sales at Newmarket and the stables of well-known trainers.
